title: Idaho Fire Map
subtitle: Be fire wise!  Know before you go.

about.aboutContent:
The goal of this map is to simplify fire information for Idaho hunters, anglers, and outdoor enthusiasts.

Closures in this map are the best available representations of official resource closures compiled from Inciweb, official websites, and wildfire teams. Please respect fire closures, and use extra caution on roadways in the vicinity of active wildfires.

Active Fire Report
Points indicate the fire origin. Clicking a popup provides incident details and a link to the fire summary on Inciweb.

Emergency Road & Trail Closures
Compiled by Idaho Parks and Recreation for trails.idaho.gov.  This includes fire-related closures among other trail closures due to flooding, access restrictions, and maintenance.

Emergency Wildfire Area Closures
Compiled and digitized by Idaho Fish and Game from the official closures posted by US Forest Service, Bureau of Land Management, and Idaho Department of Lands personnel.

Current Fire Incidents and Perimeters
Wildfire points are sourced from the Integrated Reporting of Wildland-Fire Information (IRWIN) and perimeters from the National Interagency Fire Center (NIFC).

Idaho Fire Restrictions
Current fire restriction status from the National Interagency Fire Center and Idaho Fire Information.

WMA's, GMU's and Elk Zones
For more layers and options visit the Idaho Fish and Game Huntplanner MapCenter.

Fire Detection's and Additional Layers
Derived from NASA FIRMS and made available via National Interagency Fire Center EGP National Fire Situational Awareness and the US Forest Service Active Fire Mapping Program. Fire perimeters based on aerial photography. Wildfire related weather watches and warnings source from National Weather Service. Due to heavy use by wildfire teams, these layers may be intermittently unavailable or slow to render.


A product of the Idaho Fish and Wildlife Information System
